In GPMC_MODE_CALLBACK GPMC_transfer() does not block code execution and instead calls a GPMC_CallbackFxn callback function when the transaction has completed.

Detailed Description

GPMC driver interface.

============================================================================

The GPMC header file should be included in an application as follows:

#include <ti/drv/gpmc/GPMC.h>

Macro Definition Documentation

#define GPMC_CMD_RESERVED   (32U)

Common GPMC_control command code reservation offset. GPMC driver implementations should offset command codes with GPMC_CMD_RESERVED growing positively

Example implementation specific command codes:

1 #define GPMCXYZ_COMMAND0 GPMC_CMD_RESERVED + 0
2 #define GPMCXYZ_COMMAND1 GPMC_CMD_RESERVED + 1
#define GPMC_STATUS_ERROR   (-((int32_t)1))

Generic error status code returned by GPMC_control().

GPMC_control() returns GPMC_STATUS_ERROR if the control code was not executed successfully.

#define GPMC_STATUS_RESERVED   (-((int32_t)32))

Common GPMC_control status code reservation offset. GPMC driver implementations should offset status codes with GPMC_STATUS_RESERVED growing negatively.

Example implementation specific status codes:

1 #define GPMCXYZ_STATUS_ERROR0 GPMC_STATUS_RESERVED - 0
2 #define GPMCXYZ_STATUS_ERROR1 GPMC_STATUS_RESERVED - 1
3 #define GPMCXYZ_STATUS_ERROR2 GPMC_STATUS_RESERVED - 2
#define GPMC_STATUS_SUCCESS   ((int32_t)(0))

Successful status code returned by GPMC_control().

GPMC_control() returns GPMC_STATUS_SUCCESS if the control code was executed successfully.

#define GPMC_STATUS_UNDEFINEDCMD   (-((int32_t)2))

An error status code returned by GPMC_control() for undefined command codes.

GPMC_control() returns GPMC_STATUS_UNDEFINEDCMD if the control code is not recognized by the driver implementation.

Typedef Documentation

typedef void(* GPMC_CallbackFxn) (GPMC_Handle handle, GPMC_Transaction *transaction)

The definition of a callback function used by the GPMC driver when used in GPMC_MODE_CALLBACK.

Parameters
GPMC_HandleGPMC_Handle
GPMC_Transaction*GPMC_Transaction*
typedef struct GPMC_Config_s GPMC_Config

GPMC Global configuration.

The GPMC_Config structure contains a set of pointers used to characterize the GPMC driver implementation.

This structure needs to be defined before calling GPMC_init() and it must not be changed thereafter.

See also
GPMC_init()
typedef struct GPMC_Params_s GPMC_Params

GPMC Parameters.

GPMC Parameters are used to with the GPMC_open() call. Default values for these parameters are set using GPMC_Params_init().

See also
GPMC_Params_init()

Enumeration Type Documentation

enum GPMC_TransactionType_e

Type of the GPMC transaction.

Enumerator
GPMC_TRANSACTION_TYPE_READ 

Read transaction

GPMC_TRANSACTION_TYPE_WRITE 

Write transaction

enum GPMC_TransferMode_s

GPMC transfer mode determines the whether the GPMC controller operates synchronously or asynchronously. In GPMC_MODE_BLOCKING mode GPMC_transfer() blocks code execution until the GPMC transaction has completed. In GPMC_MODE_CALLBACK GPMC_transfer() does not block code execution and instead calls a GPMC_CallbackFxn callback function when the transaction has completed.

Enumerator
GPMC_MODE_BLOCKING 

GPMC_transfer() blocks execution. This mode can only be used when called within a Task context

GPMC_MODE_CALLBACK 

GPMC_transfer() does not block code execution and will call a GPMC_CallbackFxn. This mode can be used in a Task, Swi, or Hwi context.

Function Documentation

void GPMC_close ( GPMC_Handle  handle)

Function to close a GPMC peripheral specified by the GPMC handle.

Precondition
GPMC_open() has to be called first.
Parameters
handleA GPMC handle returned from GPMC_open()
See also
GPMC_open()
int32_t GPMC_control ( GPMC_Handle  handle,
uint32_t  cmd,
void *  arg 
)

Function performs implementation specific features on a given GPMC_Handle.

Precondition
GPMC_open() has to be called first.
Parameters
handleA GPMC handle returned from GPMC_open()
cmdA command value defined by the driver specific implementation
argAn optional R/W (read/write) argument that is accompanied with cmd
Returns
Implementation specific return codes. Negative values indicate unsuccessful operations.
See also
GPMC_open()
void GPMC_init ( void  )

This function initializes the GPMC module.

Precondition
The GPMC_config structure must exist and be persistent before this function can be called. This function must also be called before any other GPMC driver APIs. This function call does not modify any peripheral registers.
GPMC_Handle GPMC_open ( uint32_t  index,
GPMC_Params *  params 
)

This function opens a given GPMC peripheral.

Precondition
GPMC controller has been initialized using GPMC_init()
See also
GPMC_init()
GPMC_close()

)

Function to perform GPMC transactions.

Returns
true if started successfully; else false
